data.text:
Current is an official publication of the Free Presbyterian Church of North America that is published quarterly. To read the articles or subscribe for a hard copy click here.

Our radio ministry stretches across the world and has led to the salvation of souls, edification of saints, and the planting of churches. If you would like to know more, visit Let The Bible Speak.

In order to train men for gospel ministry in the FPCNA, it was important to develop our own reformed and orthodox place of learning. Located in Greenville SC, click here to learn more.

Thank you for visiting our website. Please get in touch if you think we can minister to you in any way.
